This is an attempt to make a cpu/iss simulator in nim

Types

INX = enum
  NOP, ADD_R, ADD_I, SUB_R, SUB_I, LDR_I, LDR_M, STR_I, STR_R, INV_R, AND_R, AND_I, OR_R,
  OR_I, XOR_R, XOR_I, TEST_R, JMP_R, JMP_I, JEQ_R, JEQ_I, JNE_R, JNE_I, JLT_R, JLT_I, JGT_R,
  JGT_I, JLTE_R, JLTE_I, JGTE_R, JGTE_I
INX is the instruction opcode for now this opcode will be decided by an enum 
CCR = object
  zf: bool                     ## zero flag
  ltf: bool                    ## less than flag
  nf: bool                     ## negative flag
CCR - the code condition register, made up of flags 
CPU = object
  reg: array[0 .. NUM_REG, uint32] ## 32 general purpose registers
  pc: uint32                   ## program counter
  mem: array[0 .. MEM_SIZE, uint32] ## memory
  ccr: CCR
CPU - the central processing uint, 32 general purpose regs, indx register, program counter, zc

Consts

MEM_SIZE = 16384
MEM_SIZE is the total memory allocated for the ram of the cpu (16k currently) 
NUM_REG = 32
NUM_REG is the total number of general purpose registers for the cpu

Procs

proc newCPU(): CPU {...}{.raises: [], tags: [].}
newCPU returns a fully initalized (zero'd) cpu 
proc nop(cpu: var CPU) {...}{.raises: [], tags: [].}
nop is a no operation 
proc ldr_imm(cpu: var CPU; reg_src, imm_val: uint32) {...}{.raises: [], tags: [].}
ldr_imm loads the register source with the 32 bit immediate value 
proc ldr_mem(cpu: var CPU; reg_src, mem_addr: uint32) {...}{.raises: [], tags: [].}
ldr_mem loads the register source with a 32 bit value from memory 
proc str_imm(cpu: var CPU; imm_val, mem_addr: uint32) {...}{.raises: [], tags: [].}
str_imm takes the 32 bit immediate value and places it at the memory address 
proc str_reg(cpu: var CPU; reg_src, mem_addr: uint32) {...}{.raises: [], tags: [].}
str_reg takes the 32 bit value located at reg_src and places it at the memory address location 
proc add_reg(cpu: var CPU; reg_src, reg_dest: uint32) {...}{.raises: [], tags: [].}
add_reg adds the register destination and source together and places the result in the register source 
proc add_imm(cpu: var CPU; reg_src, imm_val: uint32) {...}{.raises: [], tags: [].}
add_imm adds an immediate 32 bit value to the register source 
proc sub_reg(cpu: var CPU; reg_src, reg_dest: uint32) {...}{.raises: [], tags: [].}
sub_reg subtracts the register destination from the source and stores the result in the register source 
proc sub_imm(cpu: var CPU; reg_src, imm_val: uint32) {...}{.raises: [], tags: [].}
sub_imm subtracts immediate value from the register source 
proc inv_reg(cpu: var CPU; reg_src: uint32) {...}{.raises: [], tags: [].}
inv_reg performs a bitwise NOT on the register source 
proc and_reg(cpu: var CPU; reg_src, reg_dest: uint32) {...}{.raises: [], tags: [].}
and_reg performs a bitwise AND between the register source and the register destination. the result is stored in the register source 
proc and_imm(cpu: var CPU; reg_src, imm_val: uint32) {...}{.raises: [], tags: [].}
and_imm performs a bitwise AND between the register source and the 32 bit immediate value. the result is stored in the register source 
proc or_reg(cpu: var CPU; reg_src, reg_dest: uint32) {...}{.raises: [], tags: [].}
or_reg performs a bitwise OR between the register source and the register destination. the result is stored in the register source 
proc or_imm(cpu: var CPU; reg_src, imm_val: uint32) {...}{.raises: [], tags: [].}
or_imm performs a bitwise OR between the register source and the register destination. the result is stored in the register source 
proc xor_reg(cpu: var CPU; reg_src, reg_dest: uint32) {...}{.raises: [], tags: [].}
xor_reg performs a bitwise XOR between the register source and the register destination. the result is stored in the register source 
proc xor_imm(cpu: var CPU; reg_src, imm_val: uint32) {...}{.raises: [], tags: [].}
xor_imm performs a bitwise XOR between the register source and the register destination. the result is stored in the register source 
proc test_reg(cpu: var CPU; reg_src, reg_dest: uint32) {...}{.raises: [], tags: [].}

test_reg will set the flags in the code condition register according to the result of a subtraction between the destination register and the source register (rs - rd)

zero flag is set when they are equal

less than flag is set when the destination register is less than the source register

negative flag is set when there is a bit in the sign field as the result of source register - destination register (use a reg with zero as the dest to just check 1 register)

proc jmp_reg(cpu: var CPU; reg_src: uint32) {...}{.raises: [], tags: [].}
jmp_reg jumps unconditionally to the 32 bit memory address in register source 
proc jmp_imm(cpu: var CPU; imm_val: uint32) {...}{.raises: [], tags: [].}
jmp_imm jumps unconditionally to the immediate 32 bit memory address 
proc jeq_reg(cpu: var CPU; reg_src: uint32) {...}{.raises: [], tags: [].}
jeq_reg jumps to the 32 bit memory address in register source if the zero flag is set 
proc jeq_imm(cpu: var CPU; imm_val: uint32) {...}{.raises: [], tags: [].}
jeq_imm jumps to the immediate 32 bit memory address if the zero flag is set 
proc jne_reg(cpu: var CPU; reg_src: uint32) {...}{.raises: [], tags: [].}
jne_reg jumps the 32 bit memory address in register source if the zero flag is not set 
proc jne_imm(cpu: var CPU; imm_val: uint32) {...}{.raises: [], tags: [].}
jne_imm jumps to the immediate 32 bit memory address if the zero flag is not set 
proc jlt_reg(cpu: var CPU; reg_src: uint32) {...}{.raises: [], tags: [].}
jlt_reg jumps to the 32 bit memory address in register source if the less than flag is set 
proc jlt_imm(cpu: var CPU; imm_val: uint32) {...}{.raises: [], tags: [].}
jlt_imm jumps to the immediate 32 bit memory address if the less than flag is set 
proc jgt_reg(cpu: var CPU; reg_src: uint32) {...}{.raises: [], tags: [].}
jgt_reg jumps to the 32 bit memory address in register source if the less than flag is not set 
proc jgt_imm(cpu: var CPU; imm_val: uint32) {...}{.raises: [], tags: [].}
jgt_imm jumps to the immediate 32 bit memory address if the less than flag is not set 
proc jlte_reg(cpu: var CPU; reg_src: uint32) {...}{.raises: [], tags: [].}
jlte_reg jumps to the 32 bit memory address in register source if the less than flag is set or the zero flag is set 
proc jlte_imm(cpu: var CPU; imm_val: uint32) {...}{.raises: [], tags: [].}
jlte_imm jumps to the immediate 32 bit memory address if the less than flag is set or the zero flag is set 
proc jgte_reg(cpu: var CPU; reg_src: uint32) {...}{.raises: [], tags: [].}
jgte_reg jumps to the 32 bit memory address in register source if the less than flag is not set or the zero flag is set 
proc jgte_imm(cpu: var CPU; imm_val: uint32) {...}{.raises: [], tags: [].}
jgte_imm jumps to the immediate 32 bit memory address if the less than flag is not set or the zero flag is set
